input_default.sys_prompt: You are an expert Android developer. Generate only valid Gradle build files without markdown formatting or explanations. Output raw Gradle code only.
input_default.prompt:
Generate a complete app/build.gradle file for Android app.

Requirements:
- Android SDK 34
- Kotlin 1.9+
- ViewBinding enabled
- Material Design 3: com.google.android.material:material:1.11.0
- Dependencies: androidx.core:core-ktx:1.12.0, androidx.appcompat:appcompat:1.6.1, androidx.constraintlayout:constraintlayout:2.1.4

Output ONLY the Gradle file content, no explanations.

input_default.sys_prompt: You are an expert Android developer. Generate only valid XML without markdown. Output raw XML only.
You are an expert Android Kotlin developer. Generate only valid Kotlin code without markdown. Use modern Android practices. Output raw Kotlin code starting with package declaration.
You are an expert Android UI designer. Generate only valid XML layouts with Material Design 3 components. Output raw XML only.

input_default.template:
Generate activity_main.xml for: {app_name}

Features: {features}

Requirements:
- ConstraintLayout root
- Material Design 3 components
- Responsive design
- Proper IDs
- 16dp/8dp spacing

Output ONLY XML, no markdown.

input_default.sys_prompt: You are a technical writer. Generate professional README files in Markdown.

input_default.template:
Generate professional README.md for: {app_name}

Include:

3. Requirements (SDK 24+, Kotlin 1.9+)

6. Technologies (Kotlin, Material 3, AndroidX)

8. License (MIT)

Make it professional with emojis and code blocks.

- Professional docs

Happy coding! üéâ

input_default.prompt:
Generate a complete build.gradle file for a new Android app named {{app_name}}.
App description: {{app_description}}
Required features: {{features}}

Include:
- Android SDK 34 (latest)
- Kotlin 1.9+
- Material Design 3 (com.google.android.material:material:1.11.0)
- ViewBinding enabled
- Dependencies: AndroidX Core, AppCompat, ConstraintLayout, Material Components
- Compose UI (optional but recommended)

Generate ONLY the build.gradle (app level) content. No explanations, no markdown code blocks, just the raw Gradle file content.
input_default.sys_prompt: You are an expert Android developer. Generate only valid Gradle build files without any markdown formatting or explanations.
You are an expert Android developer. Generate only valid AndroidManifest.xml files without any markdown formatting or explanations.

input_default.prompt:
Generate MainActivity.kt for Android app: {{app_name}}
Description: {{app_description}}
Features to implement: {{features}}

Requirements:
- Kotlin language
- Use ViewBinding
- Material Design 3 components
- Implement all features from the description
- Add comments for complex logic
- Follow Android best practices (MVVM pattern if complex)
- Handle lifecycle correctly
- Use proper Kotlin idioms (data classes, sealed classes, coroutines if needed)

Generate ONLY the MainActivity.kt code. No explanations, no markdown code blocks, just raw Kotlin code starting with package declaration.
input_default.sys_prompt: You are an expert Android Kotlin developer. Generate only valid Kotlin code without any markdown formatting or explanations. Use modern Android development practices.

input_default.prompt:
Generate activity_main.xml layout for Android app: {{app_name}}
Features: {{features}}

Requirements:
- ConstraintLayout or LinearLayout as root
- Material Design 3 components (MaterialButton, MaterialCardView, TextInputLayout, etc.)
- Responsive design that works on phones and tablets
- Proper spacing and margins (16dp, 8dp following Material guidelines)
- UI elements for all features in: {{features}}
- Use proper IDs for all interactive elements
- Follow Material Design color and typography system

Generate ONLY the activity_main.xml content. No explanations, no markdown, just raw XML layout code.
input_default.sys_prompt: You are an expert Android UI/UX designer. Generate only valid Android XML layouts using Material Design 3 components without any markdown formatting or explanations.
You are an expert Android developer. Generate only valid strings.xml resource files without any markdown formatting or explanations.

input_default.prompt:
Generate colors.xml resource file for Android app using Material Design 3 color system.

Include:
- Primary, secondary, tertiary colors
- Surface, background colors
- Error color
- On-primary, on-secondary, on-background colors for contrast
- Light and dark variants
- Use modern, accessible color palette

Generate ONLY the colors.xml content. No explanations, no markdown, just raw XML.
input_default.sys_prompt: You are an expert Android UI/UX designer. Generate only valid colors.xml resource files following Material Design 3 guidelines without any markdown formatting.

input_default.prompt:
Generate a professional README.md for Android app: {{app_name}}

Description: {{app_description}}
Features: {{features}}

Include sections:
1. App Overview (with emoji)
2. Features (bulleted list)
3. Screenshots (placeholder text)
4. Requirements (Android SDK 24+, Gradle 8.0+, Kotlin 1.9+)
5. Installation & Build Instructions
   - Clone the repository
   - Open in Android Studio
   - Sync Gradle
   - Run on emulator or device
6. Project Structure (explain folder organization)
7. Technologies Used (Kotlin, Material Design 3, AndroidX, ViewBinding)
8. Development Setup
9. Contributing Guidelines
10. License (MIT)
11. Contact/Author

Make it professional, well-formatted with Markdown, use emojis appropriately, and include code blocks for terminal commands.

Generate ONLY the README.md content.
input_default.sys_prompt: You are a technical writer specialized in Android documentation. Generate professional, well-structured README files in Markdown format.

input_default.prompt:

- Proper buildscript dependencies

Generate ONLY the root build.gradle content. No explanations, no markdown, just raw Gradle file.
